about_the_game:
The Vanishing of Ethan Carter - Collector's Edition Upgrade features the following items:

FULL ORIGINAL SOUNDTRACK

  • Full Soundtrack, including mixes
  • Lossless FLAC and HQ MP3
  • Click here to preview the OST

"MAKING OF" PDF ALBUM

  • Real life versus in-game
  • Behind the scenes photos

RED CREEK VALLEY DIGITAL MAP

  • Hand-painted map of the area
  • Light and medium spoilers versions

DIGITAL POSTER

  • High-resolution for print
  • Source PSD file + TGA/JPG

EXCLUSIVE WALLPAPERS

  • 720p, 1080p and 1600p
  • 16:9 and 16:10 screen ratios

package_groups.title: Buy The Vanishing of Ethan Carter - Collector's Edition Upgrade

reviews:
“The soundtrack is fantastic throughout [...]”
Eurogamer

“[...] it's important to have audiovisual stimuli worthy of the task, and The Astronauts have not disappointed there. The main theme is especially pleasing, and that first walk across the stone bridge to the Carter household is a visually evocative thing - handsome, but faintly depressing.”
The Escapist

“The Vanishing of Ethan Carter has a beautifully crafted score which sets the tempo of the narrative. Music that creates an almost a magical feeling of discovery and exploration, to music that invokes feeling of dread during critical scenes will have the hair on the back of your neck standing upright.”
GHT
short_description: The Vanishing of Ethan Carter - Collector's Edition Upgrade contains the full Original Soundtrack (including in-game mixes), as well as "Making Of" PDF Album, Digital Map of the Red Creek Valley, high resolution Digital Poster, and exclusive wallpapers.
